name: Ludum Dare 37: One Room Funeral
description:
One Room Funeral: The Exorcist

------------------------------

One Room Funeral is a 2D turn-based Exorcist simulator.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Point and click each object of the room to perform an action. Each action consumes half an hour. Click the door to go outside and attend your scheduled Exorcisms. The result of the Exorcisms is determined by your stats. Try to stay healthy and in good shape. When Happiness reaches zero, the game is over.

*Ludum Dare 37

@emontero84
